dt-example.title: Panes in Footer of DataTable
dt-example.info:
This is the searchPanes extension for DataTables. It allows results to be filtered based on the values of columns.
This example demonstrates how to make the searchPanes appear at the base of the dataTable rather than the top by setting the `-init dom` config option of `P` for SearchPanes to be at the end of the string rather than the start.
